	if (newValue == '') {
		return;
	}

		g_form.setValue('hr_name','');

	}
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>adarsh.d@advancesolutions.com</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-11-13 06:58:37</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>b5ed89e9877b745033a5baec8bbb3523</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Check PSA Contract Type</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Human Resources: Core" source="sn_hr_core">d4ac3fff5b311200a4656ede91f91af2</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Human Resources: Core">d4ac3fff5b311200a4656ede91f91af2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_b5ed89e9877b745033a5baec8bbb3523</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>adarsh.d@advancesolutions.com</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-11-13 06:58:37</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

	if (newValue == '') {

	}
	if(newValue != 'Regular') {
		g_form.setValue('hr_name','');

	}
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>adarsh.d@advancesolutions.com</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-11-13 07:23:48</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>26a35d6587bb745033a5baec8bbb350a</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Check PSA Contract Type</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Human Resources: Core" source="sn_hr_core">d4ac3fff5b311200a4656ede91f91af2</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Human Resources: Core">d4ac3fff5b311200a4656ede91f91af2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_26a35d6587bb745033a5baec8bbb350a</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>adarsh.d@advancesolutions.com</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-11-13 07:23:48</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_3ea5a62edbeab010113eb4f3399619d4
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>sn_hr_core.PSAoperationsUtil</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>PSAoperationsUtil</name><script><![CDATA[var PSAoperationsUtil = Class.create();
PSAoperationsUtil.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {

	currencyPopulate: function() {
		gs.info("Inside function", 'AD');
		var currency = '';
		var country = this.getParameter('sysparm_country');
		var ga = new GlideRecord('sn_hr_core_duty_station');
		ga.addQuery('sys_id', country);
		ga.query();
		gs.info('in 1st log','AD');
		if (ga.next()) {
			var gr = new GlideRecord('fx_currency');
			gr.addQuery('u_country', 'IN', ga.u_country);
			gr.query();
			gs.info('in 2nd log','AD');
			if (gr.next()) {
				currency = gr.sys_id;
				gs.info('in 3rd log','AD');
			}

		}
		return currency;


	},

	/*
	Queries and returns all the variable names associated to the catalog item
	@parm: sys_id of the catalog item in concern
	@return: comma separated names of the variables
	*/
	getFieldNames: function() {

		var arrNames = [];
		var catItem = this.getParameter('sysparm_catItem');
		var grVariables = new GlideRecord('item_option_new');
		grVariables.addQuery('cat_item', catItem);
		grVariables.addQuery('type', '!=', '19');
		grVariables.addQuery('type', '!=', '20');
		grVariables.addQuery('type', '!=', '24');
		grVariables.query();
		while(grVariables.next()) {

			arrNames.push({
				'name': grVariables.getValue('name'),
				'mandatory':  grVariables.getValue('mandatory')
			});
		}
		return JSON.stringify(arrNames);

	},

	psaContractTypeDutyCountry: function() {
		var psaContractType = '';
		var dutyStationCountry = '';
		var grade = '';
		var subPerson = this.getParameter('sysparm_user_name');
		var grProfile = new GlideRecord('sn_hr_core_profile');
		if(grProfile.get(subPerson)) {
			psaContractType = grProfile.getValue('u_psa_contract_type');
			grade = grProfile.getValue('u_calc_grade_step');

			var grDutyStation = new GlideRecord('sn_hr_core_duty_station');
			if(grDutyStation.get(grProfile.getValue('u_duty_station'))) {
				dutyStationCountry = grDutyStation.getValue('u_country');
			}
		}

		return psaContractType+','+dutyStationCountry+','+grade;


	},
	
	psaContract: function() {
		var psaContractType = '';
		var subPerson = this.getParameter('sysparm_user_name');
		var grProfile = new GlideRecord('sn_hr_core_profile');
		grProfile.addQuery('user',subPerson);
		grProfile.query();
		
		if(grProfile.next()){
			psaContractType = grProfile.getValue('u_psa_contract_type');
		}

		return psaContractType;


	},

	isPSA: function() {
		var isPsa = false;
		var grProfile = new GlideRecord('sn_hr_core_profile');
		if(grProfile.get(gs.getUserID())) {
			if(grProfile.getValue('u_contract_type') == 'ipsa' || grProfile.getValue('u_contract_type') == 'npsa') {
				isPsa = true;
			}
		}
		return isPsa;
	},

	isHirePSA: function() {
		var caseID = this.getParameter('sysparm_case');
		var gr = new GlideRecord('sn_hr_core_case');
		if(gr.get(caseID)) {
			if(gr.hr_service == '8a61b83cdb7db094113eb4f33996190f' || gr.hr_service == 'c6b5ffd71b46bc9038e2520e6e4bcb4c') {
				return true;
			} else {
				return false;
			}
		}
	},
	
	userManager: function(){
		var obj = '';
		var pos = this.getParameter('sysparm_position');
		var grPosition = new GlideRecord('sn_hr_core_position');
		grPosition.addQuery('position',pos);
		grPosition.query();
		if(grPosition.next())
			{
				obj=grPosition.getValue('u_hiring_manager');
			}
					
		return obj;
		
	},

	type: 'PSAoperationsUtil'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>akshat.j@advancesolutions.com</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-09-15 12:38:20</sys_created_on><sys_id>3ea5a62edbeab010113eb4f3399619d4</sys_id><sys_mod_count>26</sys_mod_count><sys_name>PSAoperationsUtil</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Human Resources: Core" source="sn_hr_core">d4ac3fff5b311200a4656ede91f91af2</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Human Resources: Core">d4ac3fff5b311200a4656ede91f91af2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_3ea5a62edbeab010113eb4f3399619d4</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>adarsh.d@advancesolutions.com</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-11-15 08:33:33</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>true</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>true</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>true</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Unpaid Leave (PSA)">b9aa486d1b56301438e2520e6e4bcbcf</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:caaac86d1b56301438e2520e6e4bcbd7</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Autofill PSA Contract Type & Duty Count.</name><order>100</order><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
	if (newValue == '') {
		return;
	}

	var ga = new GlideAjax('sn_hr_core.PSAoperationsUtil');
	ga.addParam('sysparm_name','psaContract'); 
	ga.addParam('sysparm_user_name', newValue); 
	ga.getXML(fillPSAContractType);  

	function fillPSAContractType(response) {  
		var answer = response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute("answer");
		alert(answer);
		g_form.setValue('u_psa_contract_type', answer);
		

	}
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>adarsh.d@advancesolutions.com</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-11-13 07:23:34</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>1f93196587bb745033a5baec8bbb35d2</sys_id><sys_mod_count>9</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Autofill PSA Contract Type & Duty Count.</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Human Resources: Core" source="sn_hr_core">d4ac3fff5b311200a4656ede91f91af2</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Human Resources: Core">d4ac3fff5b311200a4656ede91f91af2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_1f93196587bb745033a5baec8bbb35d2</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>adarsh.d@advancesolutions.com</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-11-15 08:15:54</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>true</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>true</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>true</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Staff Association Contributions (PSA)">576d7bf91b66f85038e2520e6e4bcb18</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:27cc3da41bc2601038e2520e6e4bcb94</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Autofill PSA Contract Type & Duty Count.</name><order>100</order><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
	if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
		return;
	}
	var ga = new GlideAjax('sn_hr_core.PSAoperationsUtil');
	ga.addParam('sysparm_name','psaContractTypeDutyCountry'); 
	ga.addParam('sysparm_user_name', g_form.getValue('hr_name')); 
	ga.getXML(fillPSAContractType);  

	function fillPSAContractType(response) {  
		var answer = response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute("answer");
		answer = answer.split(',');
		g_form.setValue('u_psa_contract_type', answer[0]);
		//g_form.setValue('u_psa_duty_station_country', answer[1]);
		

	}
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>adarsh.d@advancesolutions.com</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-11-13 06:59:06</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>7c0e012d877b745033a5baec8bbb35fa</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Autofill PSA Contract Type & Duty Count.</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Human Resources: Core" source="sn_hr_core">d4ac3fff5b311200a4656ede91f91af2</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Human Resources: Core">d4ac3fff5b311200a4656ede91f91af2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_7c0e012d877b745033a5baec8bbb35fa</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>adarsh.d@advancesolutions.com</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-11-13 06:59:06</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Lateral transfer (Regular NPSA)">8becf371db6a7c50113eb4f339961967</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:c5bf7f191bf454501b50ca286e4bcb0a</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages>For other users except service contract go to "Change in assignment for existing staff form" link is in above description</messages><name>Check Contract type - Service Contract</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
	if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
		return;
	}

	//Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below
	if(newValue != 'npsa')
	{
		g_form.setValue('hr_name','');
		//g_form.showErrorBox('hr_name','For other users except service contract go to "Change in assignment for existing staff form" link is in above description ',false);
		g_form.showErrorBox('hr_name',getMessage('Only for Regular NPSA users'),false);
		
// 		g_form.setValue('subject_person','');
// 		g_form.showErrorBox('subject_person','For other users except service contract go to "Change in assignment for existing staff form" link is in above description ',false);
	}
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>adarsh.d@advancesolutions.com</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-09-13 11:03:26</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>d1fcb3f1db6a7c50113eb4f3399619d9</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Check Contract type - Service Contract</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Human Resources: Core" source="sn_hr_core">d4ac3fff5b311200a4656ede91f91af2</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Human Resources: Core">d4ac3fff5b311200a4656ede91f91af2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_d1fcb3f1db6a7c50113eb4f3399619d9</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>adarsh.d@advancesolutions.com</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-11-13 05:59:20</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
